title: Bug: orientation not restored and not allowed when going back from a phone call to Google Maps
content:
I'm very sure it's not related at all to Pixel 4, but sadly this is incredibly hard to reproduce for me, as it requires me to drive while doing so. Not to mention privacy-related matter of publishing it here or on the original place I've reported about this.
I've reported it here:
https://issuetracker.google.com/issues/171493255

The steps are:
Use Google Maps on landscape mode and navigate using it, while driving. 
Have a phone call (incoming/outgoing), which sadly puts Google Maps work in a floating UI.
After the phone call ends, go back to Google Maps.

The bug is that not only it doesn't restore landscape mode, but it doesn't even let you switch to landscape mode, while on Google Maps.

Please fix it. I don't care if it's related to Google Pixel or Android.
I'm very sure it's about Android OS. Not Google Pixel.
